name: BAYONETTO REVENGEANCE
description:
Bayonetto Revengeance is a rythm fighting game made for a two day  Bayonetta-themed student game jam

Destroy all your enemies on beat and keep your multiplier going for the highest score possible !

> Currently 5 Songs with varying difficulty
> Punchy and satisfying feedbacks
> Accessible and easy to pick up

-Controls-

  Left Up -> E                        O <- Right Up
  Left Down -> F           K <- Right Down

-Team-

Paul Lejuste & Tom Le Corvic -> Tech art and VFX

Chloé Hecquefeuille -> Character art and animation

Sonia Mokt -> Environments and UI

Victor Salembier -> Game and Level Design

Etienne Javelle -> Tool and UI Programming

Thomas Vignes-> Gameplay Programming
